title: Ep 353: Two Stock Experts Share Their Favorite Ideas
itunes:title: Two Stock Experts Share Their Favorite Ideas
description:
Dan Ferris, editor of the Extreme Value newsletter at Stansberry Research, explains deep value investing.  He shows us exactly what metrics he uses to value stocks and how investors can avoid value traps.  Dan also shares some of his favorite stocks to buy.  
Dr. David Eifrig, editor of the Retirement Millionaire and Retirement Trader newsletters at Stansberry Research, outlines several key steps young investors need to take to become millionaires by the time they retire. Dr. Eifrig then explains why investors should not be scared to own stocks.  He also shares some of his favorite investment ideas.
